transformlib documentation¶

Documentation Build Date: Sep 11, 2024 Version: 0.2.7

Useful links: Source Repository Examples

Enables the user to organize transformations of data as a regular Python package.

Often one ends up having a lot of main scripts that somehow loads, transforms and saves data.

This package enables the user to organize these scripts in a way that makes them easy to run in the expected order of execution and easier to read.
